CustomField.formula:
IF( AND( TEXT(ht_Producer__r.ht_NPNStatus__c) = "Active", ISPICKVAL(ht_Producer__r.ht_Type__c, 'Agent') ), "NPN is for an Agent (Not an Agency)",
IF( TEXT(ht_Producer__r.ht_NPNStatus__c) = "Invalid NPN", "The NPN was rejected by NIPR",
IF( OR( TEXT(ht_Producer__r.ht_NPNStatus__c) = "Active", TEXT(ht_Producer__r.ht_NPNStatus__c) = "Processing" ), "", ht_Producer__r.ht_NPNSyncError__c ) ) )
CustomField.label: NPN Sync Error
